openAPIV3Schema.description: Alarm is the Schema for the alarms API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: AlarmSpec defines the desired state of Alarm

clusterSpecific.description: Specifies if the alarm is within cluster, such as pod issue, or external issue, such as with BGP session on node

group.description: The group of the resouce the alarm is associated with, for example core.eda.nokia.com

jsPath.description: Provide a JSON path to the resource or object that the alarm is associated with, for example .node{.name=='leaf-1-1'}.srl{.version=='24.7.1'}.interface{.name=='ethernet-1-11'

kind.description: The kind of the resource the alarm is associated with, for example TopoNode

name.description: Name of the alarm, this is typically the alarm Kind followed by a unique identifier such as InterfaceDown-leaf-1-1-ethernet-1-11

parentAlarm.description: ParentAlarm is the name of the parent alarm, if any, for example LinecardDown-leaf-1-1-Linecard1

probableCause.description: ProbableCause is the probable cause of the alarm

remedialAction.description: RemedialAction is the proposed remedial action for the alarm

resource.description: The name of the resouce the alarm is associated with, for example leaf-1-1

sourceGroup.description: The group of the resource that raise the alarm, for example core.eda.nokia.com

sourceKind.description: The kind of the resource that raised the alarm, for example InterfaceState

sourceResource.description: The resource that raised the alarm, for example

type.description: Type of the alarm, for example InterfaceDown

status.description: AlarmStatus defines the observed state of Alarm

conditions.message: the initial names have been accepted
